name: Pichu
flavorText:
It is not yet
skilled at storing
electricity. It may send out a
jolt if amused
or startled.
formDescription: Spiky-eared Pichu can only be received by taking the shiny Pichu from an official promotion to celebi's shrine in ilex forest.  Spiky-eared Pichu is always female, cannot evolve, cannot be taken into the Wi-Fi Club or the Union Room, and cannot be transferred to Generation V, but is otherwise a normal Pichu.

previous.name: Lanturn
previous.flavorText:
The light it emits
is so bright that
it can illuminate the sea's surface
from a depth of
over three miles.

next.name: Cleffa
next.flavorText:
Because of its
unusual, star-like
silhouette, people believe that it
came here on
a meteor.

pokemon.flavorText:
It is not yet
skilled at storing
electricity. It may send out a
jolt if amused
or startled.
pokemon.formDescription: Spiky-eared Pichu can only be received by taking the shiny Pichu from an official promotion to celebi's shrine in ilex forest.  Spiky-eared Pichu is always female, cannot evolve, cannot be taken into the Wi-Fi Club or the Union Room, and cannot be transferred to Generation V, but is otherwise a normal Pichu.

pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.flavorText:
When several of
these POKéMON
gather, their electricity could
build and cause
lightning storms.

pokemon.name: Raichu
pokemon.flavorText:
Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself
from its own high-voltage power.
